Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requests for employee personnel records
Summary: Requires agencies and public employers to provide notice and a review period to employees whose personnel records have been provided pursuant to the state's freedom of information law.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requests for employee personnel records
